## Description {#details}

Traits for options for <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node">ilist&#95;node</a></em>.

This is usually computed via <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-detail/compute-node-options">compute&#95;node&#95;options</a></em>.
